ManagerECRPolicyType.Description: Choosing 'unspecified' leaves it up to other existing policies.

ManagerECRPolicyARNs.Description: List of ECR ARNs to which the manager ECR policy type applies.  Format: <ecr-arn>[, ... ]

WorkerECRPolicyType.Description: Choosing 'unspecified' leaves it up to other existing policies.

WorkerECRPolicyARNs.Description: List of ECR ARNs to which the worker ECR policy type applies.  Format: <ecr-arn>[, ... ]

ECRAuthLoginTargets.Description: List of AWS regions and/or account-ids to maintain ECR auth credentials in the swarm.  At minimum, a value of '=' is required to enable this feature, which defaults to current AWS Region and AccountId.  Format: [<region>][=[<acct-id>[:<acct-id> ...]]][, ... ]
